DOC.brief_title: Endurant Stent Graft Natural Selection Global Postmarket Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The Endurant Stent Graft Natural Selection Global Post-market Registry , ENGAGE initiate expand clinical knowledge base include 'real world ' subject , apply minimal amount subject selection criterion . This subject group may better represent subject profile treat actual clinical practice without select sub-groups particular low/high risk exclude certain disease . ENGAGE aim follow document subject selection , diagnostic tool use treatment intervention choose vascular surgeon interventional radiologist . ENGAGE impose CIP require study procedure affect clinical practice .

The subject legal representative inform nature trial consent participate authorize collection release medical information Intention electively implant ENDURANT Stent Graft System Ability willingness comply CIP .
